data.name: Kowi Ishto: Battle of Akonoli Original Soundtrack - Chiptune Version
data.detailed_description:
Kowi Ishto: Battle of Akonoli Original Soundtrack - Chiptune Version


The Kowi Ishto: Battle of Akonoli Original Soundtrack - Chiptune Version is inspired by chiptune music in the 80's and 90's.

There are 17 Tracks.
